      Returns:

    • getGrayscaleImage

      public Matrix getGrayscaleImage(Mino m) throws Exception
      A method to convert the board and the argument Mino into a grayscale image. This will generate a Matrix object, where the rows of this object correspond to x coordinates and the columns of this object correspond to y coordinates. Remember, when dealing with a Board object, Coordinates are represented in (y,x) format, so the Matrix produced by this method uses (x,y), a transposed coordinate system from what the Board uses. The Matrix image will align with the coordinate system of the game if it is rendered. Pixels in this matrix will be set to 0.0 if they are unoccupied, 0.5 if occupied by a Mino but not the argument Mino, and 1.0 if occupied by the argument Mino.
      Parameters:
      Mino - the Mino to place on the map.
      Returns:
      a Matrix object containing the image
      Throws:
      Exception

    • didAgentLose

      public boolean didAgentLose()
      A method to check if the player has lost the game.
      Returns:
      true if the agent lost, false otherwise.
